PHRASE.LANG: Explore through PlayStation®Home in style, riding this slick animated motorcylce! The pulsating neon glows cycle through all different colours as well as varying in intensity. Zooming around, you'll hear the futuristic sound of your turbo engine, and a streak of light will stretch from your tail lights! [#Legal]

Explorez PlayStation®Home avec style, aux commandes de cette moto futuriste! Les lumières néon changent de couleur et varient en intensité. En accélérant, vous entendrez le son du turbo, et une trainée lumineuse s'étirera de vos phares arrières! [#Legal]
Entdecken Sie über PlayStation®Home in modernem Stil: fahren Sie dieses futuristische animierte Motorräder! Die pulsierende Neoneffekten durchlaufen alle Farben.[#Legal]
Esplora PlayStation®Home con stile, con questa moto futuristica! Le luci al neon cambiano colore. [#Legal]
Explora PlayStation®Home con estilo, con esta moto futurista. Las luces de neón cambian de color.[#Legal]

Explore through PlayStation®Home in style, riding this slick animated motorcylce! The pulsating neon glows cycle through all different colors as well as varying in intensity. Zooming around, you'll hear the futuristic sound of your turbo engine, and a streak of light will stretch from your tail lights![#Legal]

Explore through PlayStation®Home in style, riding this slick animated motorcylce! The pulsating neon glows cycle through all different colors as well as varying in intensity. Zooming around, you'll hear the futuristic sound of your turbo engine, and a streak of light will stretch from your tail lights![#Legal]
